subtask.title: Review alternative AI methods and approaches
subtask.objective: Summarize other prevalent AI approaches (e.g., machine learning models, rule-based systems, deep learning) for comparison.
subtask.scope: Technical details, typical applications, and performance metrics of alternative methods.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings focus predominantly on AI agents, testing practices, and automation, with some mentions of machine learning and optimization. However, they lack comprehensive coverage of traditional AI approaches such as rule-based systems, classical machine learning models, and deep learning details, including their technical aspects, typical applications, and performance metrics.

missing_aspects: traditional ML models (e.g., decision trees, SVMs)
performance metrics and evaluations for these methods
technical details and typical applications of rule-based and classical ML approaches

missing_requirements: Detailed summaries of alternative AI approaches beyond AI agents and testing, including rule-based systems, classical machine learning models, and deep learning
Technical details, typical applications, and performance metrics of these methods
